certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.
Application is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues.
Certificate algorithm might be vulnerable to hash collision

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
manifest_analysis.desc: The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup] flag is missing.

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (NFCard) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has no network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt any data in traffic or does not transmit any data between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings: "msg_nocard" : "No Card been read, Please take the card near to the back cover of phone and try again"

"info_about" : "
 NFCard v

NFCard程序使用NFC传感器读取非接触式IC卡，电子标签（如公交卡，银行卡，图书馆射频标贴等）中的信息。
支持符合iso7816-3 / iso15693 / felicia等国际标准的卡片，并且可以扩充支持一些专门标准（如中国的pboc2.0）
NFCard程序可以用来读取电子钱包（主要是公交卡）中未加密的余额，交易记录，电子标签中的标识等信息。

本程序开源/免费。允许自由传播和修改，具体的规则请遵照自由软件基金会的通用公共授权第三版（GUN GPLv3），参见www.gnu.org/licenses。

最新版的程序和源代码可以从code.google.com/p/nfcard获取。

作者：sinpo, 2011.
"
"msg_nfcdisabled" : "NFC已被禁用，请先启用该硬件。可以使用下边的 ‘设置’ 按钮控制NFC传感器的开关。"
"msg_copied" : "卡片信息已經復制到剪貼板"

"info_about" : "
 NFCard v

NFCard程序使用NFC傳感器讀取非接觸式IC卡，電子標簽（如公交卡，銀行卡，圖書館射頻標貼等）中的信息。
支持符合iso7816-3 / iso15693 / felicia等國際標準的卡片，並且可以擴充支持一些專門標準（如中國的pboc2.0）
NFCard程序可以用來讀取電子錢包（主要是公交卡）中未加密的余額，交易記錄，電子標簽中的標識等信息。

本程序開源/免費。允許自由傳播和修改，具體的規則請遵照自由軟件基金會的通用公共授權第三版（GUN GPLv3），參見www.gnu.org/licenses。

最新版的程序和源代碼可以從code.google.com/p/nfcard獲取。

作者：sinpo, 2011.
"
"msg_copied" : "Card information has been copied to clipboard"

"info_help" : "
使用前请先确认NFC传感器已经启用（可以通过“设置”按钮打开系统设置对话框进行调整）。
读卡时请将卡片靠近手机NFC传感器（一般是在手机后盖），并持续几秒种，以便程序读取信息。

目前Android系统的NFC硬件与有些卡片的兼容性不是很好，读卡失败率较高，需要反复读取。有必要的时候请尝试关闭传感器硬件，然后重新启用。

已经确认可以读取的卡片有：深圳通卡（新版），香港八达通卡，深圳图书馆读者证，北京市政一卡通（新版），西安长安通卡，武汉城市一卡通。其他类型的卡有待测试。本程序源码公开，欢迎各地有兴趣的朋友帮助扩充支持的类型，可以直接修改代码或提供测试卡片。
"
"msg_nonfc" : "No NFC hardware found, Program will NOT work."
"msg_nfcdisabled" : "NFC已被禁用，請先啟用該硬件。可以使用下方的 ‘設置’ 按鈕控制NFC傳感器的開關。"
"msg_nfcdisabled" : "NFC hardware has been disabled, Please enable it first. (using the 'Setting' button to turn it on or off)"

"info_help" : "
使用前請先確認NFC傳感器已經啟用（可以通過“設置”按鈕打開系統設置對話框進行調整）。
讀卡時請將卡片靠近手機NFC傳感器（一般是在手機後蓋），並持續幾秒種，以便程序讀取信息。

目前Android系統的NFC硬件與有些卡片的兼容性不是很好，讀卡失敗率較高，需要反復讀取。有必要的時候請嘗試關閉傳感器硬件，然後重新啟用。

已經確認可以讀取的卡片有：深圳通卡（新版），香港八達通卡，深圳圖書館讀者證，北京市政一卡通（新版），西安長安通卡，武漢城市一卡通。其他類型的卡有待測試。本程序源碼公開，歡迎各地有興趣的朋友幫助擴充支持的類型，可以直接修改代碼或提供測試卡片。
"

"info_help" : "
Make sure that the NFC sensor is enaled before read card. You can click 'setting' button to open system configure dialog to confirm.
When reading card, please take your card close to NFC sensor of phone (normally, it is at back cover of the phone) and hold a few seconds so that program can read data out.

phone's NFC hardware and os performance is not as good as expect currently, so it may need repeatedly read for whese kind of cards. (In case of always fail, You can try to disable NFC sensor and then re-enable it.)

So far we've confirmed the following can be read: ShenzhenTong Card (newer version) of Shenzhen, Octopus Card of Hongkong, Reader Card of Shenzhen Library, Beijing Municipal Card (newer version), Changan Card of Shaanxi,Xi'an, Wuhan City Smart Card. This is an open source application, welcome everyone participation in development,extends it to read more types of card, Also welcome provide test cards.
"
"msg_nocard" : "沒有卡片信息，請將卡片靠近手機後蓋嘗試重新讀取。"
"msg_nonfc" : "沒有找到NFC硬件，程序無法工作！"
"msg_nonfc" : "没有找到NFC硬件，程序无法工作！"
"msg_copied" : "卡片信息已经复制到剪贴板"

"info_about" : "
 NFCard v

NFCard can read contactless IC card use NFC sensor.
Support a range of iso7816-3 / iso15693 / felicia compliant e-wallet / RFID cards, and can be extended to support many specific data protocol, e.g. pboc2.0 of china.
NFCard can read information like balance of account, transaction log, etc. from these cards

This is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. see www.gnu.org/licenses.

Newest version and source code can be found at code.google.com/p/nfcard

By sinpo, 2011.
"
"msg_nocard" : "没有卡片信息，请将卡片靠近手机后盖尝试重新读取。"

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

high.title: Certificate algorithm might be vulnerable to hash collision
high.description: Application is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues.

high.title: Launch Mode of Activity (NFCard) is not standard.
high.description: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.

warning.title: Application Data can be Backed up
warning.description:
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

secure.title: This application has no privacy trackers
secure.description: This application does not include any user or device trackers. Unable to find trackers during static analysis.
